Bill Details
  • ID: {{billDetails.id}}
  • Date: {{billDetails.billingDate | date:'medium'}}
  • CustomerID: {{billDetails.customerId}}
  • Customer Name: {{billDetails.customer?.name}}
  • Customer Email: {{billDetails.customer?.email}}
Product ID Product Name Price Quantity Amount
{{pi.productId}} {{pi.product?.name}} {{pi.price | number:'1.2-2'}} {{pi.quantity}} {{pi.amount | number:'1.2-2'}}
